verses.text: Now these were the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, which were \w born|strong="H3205"\w* unto him in \w Hebron|strong="H2275"\w*; the \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w* \w Amnon|strong="H0550"\w*, of \w Ahinoam|strong="H0293"\w* the \w Jezreelitess|strong="H3159"\w*; the \w second|strong="H8145"\w* \w Daniel|strong="H1840"\w*, of \w Abigail|strong="H0026"\w* the \w Carmelitess|strong="H3762"\w*:\f + \fr 3.1 \ft Daniel: or, Chileab\f*

The \w third|strong="H7992"\w*, \w Absalom|strong="H0053"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Maachah|strong="H4601"\w* the \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Talmai|strong="H8526"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Geshur|strong="H1650"\w*: the \w fourth|strong="H7243"\w*, \w Adonijah|strong="H0138"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Haggith|strong="H2294"\w*:

The \w fifth|strong="H2549"\w*, \w Shephatiah|strong="H8203"\w* of \w Abital|strong="H0037"\w*: the \w sixth|strong="H8345"\w*, \w Ithream|strong="H3507"\w* by \w Eglah|strong="H5698"\w* his \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*.

\add These\add* \w six|strong="H8337"\w* were \w born|strong="H3205"\w* unto him in \w Hebron|strong="H2275"\w*; and there he \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* and \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w months|strong="H2320"\w*: and in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* he \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* and \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*.

And these were \w born|strong="H3205"\w* unto him in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*; \w Shimea|strong="H8092"\w*, and \w Shobab|strong="H7727"\w*, and \w Nathan|strong="H5416"\w*, and \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w*, \w four|strong="H0702"\w*, of \w Bath-shua|strong="H1340"\w* the \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Ammiel|strong="H5988"\w*:\f + \fr 3.5 \ft Shimea: or, Shammua\f*\f + \fr 3.5 \ft Bath-shua: or, Bath-sheba\f*\f + \fr 3.5 \ft Ammiel: or, Eliam\f*
\w Ibhar|strong="H2984"\w* also, and \w Elishama|strong="H0476"\w*, and \w Eliphelet|strong="H0467"\w*,\f + \fr 3.6 \ft Elishama: also called, Elishua\f*
And \w Nogah|strong="H5052"\w*, and \w Nepheg|strong="H5298"\w*, and \w Japhia|strong="H3309"\w*,
And \w Elishama|strong="H0476"\w*, and \w Eliada|strong="H0450"\w*, and \w Eliphelet|strong="H0467"\w*, \w nine|strong="H8672"\w*.\f + \fr 3.8 \ft Eliada: or, Beeliada\f*

\add These were\add* all the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, beside the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of the \w concubines|strong="H6370"\w*, and \w Tamar|strong="H8559"\w* their \w sister|strong="H0269"\w*.

¶ And \w Solomon’s|strong="H8010"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \add was\add* \w Rehoboam|strong="H7346"\w*, \w Abia|strong="H0029"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w Asa|strong="H0609"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*,\f + \fr 3.10 \ft Abia: or, Abijam\f*

\w Joram|strong="H3141"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w Ahaziah|strong="H0274"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w Joash|strong="H3101"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*,\f + \fr 3.11 \ft Ahaziah: or, Azariah\f*

\w Amaziah|strong="H0558"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w Azariah|strong="H5838"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w Jotham|strong="H3147"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*,\f + \fr 3.12 \ft Azariah: or, Uzziah\f*
\w Ahaz|strong="H0271"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*,
\w Amon|strong="H0526"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w Josiah|strong="H2977"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*.

And the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Josiah|strong="H2977"\w* \add were\add*, the \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w* \w Johanan|strong="H3110"\w*, the \w second|strong="H8145"\w* \w Jehoiakim|strong="H3079"\w*, the \w third|strong="H7992"\w* \w Zedekiah|strong="H6667"\w*, the \w fourth|strong="H7243"\w* \w Shallum|strong="H7967"\w*.\f + \fr 3.15 \ft Johanan: or, Jehoahaz\f*\f + \fr 3.15 \ft Jehoiakim: or, Eliakim\f*\f + \fr 3.15 \ft Zedekiah: or, Mattaniah\f*

And the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jehoiakim|strong="H3079"\w*: \w Jeconiah|strong="H3204"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w Zedekiah|strong="H6667"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*.\f + \fr 3.16 \ft Jeconiah: also called, Jehoiachin or Coniah\f*

¶ And the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jeconiah|strong="H3204"\w*; \w Assir|strong="H0617"\w*, \w Salathiel|strong="H7597"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*,\f + \fr 3.17 \ft Salathiel: Heb. Shealtiel\f*

\w Malchiram|strong="H4443"\w* also, and \w Pedaiah|strong="H6305"\w*, and \w Shenazar|strong="H8137"\w*, \w Jecamiah|strong="H3359"\w*, \w Hoshama|strong="H1953"\w*, and \w Nedabiah|strong="H5072"\w*.

And the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Pedaiah|strong="H6305"\w* \add were\add*, \w Zerubbabel|strong="H2216"\w*, and \w Shimei|strong="H8096"\w*: and the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Zerubbabel|strong="H2216"\w*; \w Meshullam|strong="H4918"\w*, and \w Hananiah|strong="H2608"\w*, and \w Shelomith|strong="H8019"\w* their \w sister|strong="H0269"\w*:
And \w Hashubah|strong="H2807"\w*, and \w Ohel|strong="H0169"\w*, and \w Berechiah|strong="H1296"\w*, and \w Hasadiah|strong="H2619"\w*, \w Jushab-hesed|strong="H3142"\w*, \w five|strong="H2568"\w*.

And the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Hananiah|strong="H2608"\w*; \w Pelatiah|strong="H6410"\w*, and \w Jesaiah|strong="H3470"\w*: the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Rephaiah|strong="H7509"\w*, the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Arnan|strong="H0770"\w*, the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Obadiah|strong="H5662"\w*, the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Shechaniah|strong="H7935"\w*.

And the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Shechaniah|strong="H7935"\w*; \w Shemaiah|strong="H8098"\w*: and the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Shemaiah|strong="H8098"\w*; \w Hattush|strong="H2407"\w*, and \w Igeal|strong="H3008"\w*, and \w Bariah|strong="H1282"\w*, and \w Neariah|strong="H5294"\w*, and \w Shaphat|strong="H8202"\w*, \w six|strong="H8337"\w*.

And the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Neariah|strong="H5294"\w*; \w Elioenai|strong="H0454"\w*, and \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w*, and \w Azrikam|strong="H5840"\w*, \w three|strong="H7969"\w*.\f + \fr 3.23 \ft Hezekiah: Heb. Hiskijah\f*

And the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Elioenai|strong="H0454"\w* \add were\add*, \w Hodaiah|strong="H1939"\w*, and \w Eliashib|strong="H0475"\w*, and \w Pelaiah|strong="H6411"\w*, and \w Akkub|strong="H6126"\w*, and \w Johanan|strong="H3110"\w*, and \w Dalaiah|strong="H1806"\w*, and \w Anani|strong="H6054"\w*, \w seven|strong="H7651"\w*.
